Blog.post: Ok schools done with and now it's summer time. Time to party! And the best paart is that Kelsey will finally be able to spend time with me. Yaaaaaaaa! Can't wait till the pool party on Saturday. I had to clean today. Ahhhh! I'm bored though. O well.

We officially have only 2 days left until the last day of school. Yeahhhhhh! Today was so funny because I was doing my extra credit project in reading with Paige and Brianna, so we went up to do our report on "Harry Potter and the Sorcerers Stone," I read that book like a bajillion years ago. Well anyways we went up and I had to go first since I was Harry Potter and I had these pimpin glasses on(no not really they looked stupid). Then I tried to do the british accent and my line was "Hello! My name is Harry, Harry Potter," then I embarrassed myself so bad because I burst out laughing cause my voice sounded so corny. Oh well... I did good otherwise. I had to wear a gay dracula cape though and this gay red top, but I took the shirt off cause Abel and Josh kept laughing at me. To end the school year I'm havin a pool party, but I'm only inviting 3 people cause I feel like it. I saw Shrek 2 yesterday and that was soooooooooo funny. We drank some magic potion and now we're sexy! Donkey and Shrek looked so different after they drank the potion. Shrek's line "Do you still know the muffin man?", brang me back to the first movie of the gingerbread man's famous lines. Well in the yearbook I look like crapolla and today danielle got dissed cause I could do a better bridge then her...and she was makin fun of me cause she said I would probably be tired out after got on the ground and I wouldn't be able to do it. Well I proved her wrong. William kicked me in the shins where I had bruises all over them already. So I got him back and I stuck jollyrancher on his back especially after the coment he made the comment to cassidy "... her fat ass just can't wait to eat that jollyrancher" well I didn't eat it I licked it and stuck it on his back. Haha. He shouldn't be talking since he has got man boobies on the front and back and they are bigger than his stomach which will devour you if you get near him. What a fat fuck. Well I guess I'll write again tommorow if I can. Time for bed. Goodnight.

Well lets see...on Thursday we played with fire on Friday we got our yearbooks and I had to do an extra credit project. Then at Paige's house I got high and me and Brianna and Paige were bein goofballs. On Saturday we swan and jumped on the trampoline all day then went to Kevyn's birthday. And on top of that I had swimming everyday. I feel like shit and I still haven't finished my extra credit for the stupid ass teacher Mrs. Hare well...at least I'm seeing Shrek 2 tommorow...I want to see that so bad. Bye Bye...it's late.

Yo wats up? Well I have tooken every imaginable test this week and I still have to do the rest of the math and drama and another social studies test tommorow. The finals suck! I had to do: Math Pre-Algebra Final 1st Year Spanish Final Phantom of the Opera Memorized Lines Final Phantom of of the Opera Script Final Science: Monerans Final Tangerine Final Latitude and Longitude Test Dot to Dot Grid test ...and the school year is almost over and I'm still doing projects. Well that's why I haven't written in a while so catch ya later.

Hi. Today was fun beacause it was Friday Funday. You're a monster! Eat me! Not my buttons, not my gumdrop buttons! Do you know the Muffin Man? The Muffin Man?! Yes the Muffin Man. Who lives on Dreary Lane? Yes. So..she married the Muffin Man. Yessss! ...and in the morning I'm makin waffles. You need a tic tac cause your breath stinks! Guess what movie we saw. Yes! Your right...Shrek! HEHE. Well then there is the bad news as always...William's mad at me again, what a asshole! I didn't even do anything to him. Tellin me to fuck off and all..well back at you William or should I call you Will, you know you like Cheyenne you bitch motherfucker. Well I think I've said enough. Goodbye.

Hey. Carly here. Don't have much to say today except I cleaned my room...how boring. Well watever. Had to get my computer fixed today...that's y I haven't been on for 2 days. Click It and go on ISKETCH it's fun! www.addictinggames.com

Hmm... It's been awhile since I have wrote anything. Damn I missed the free Sum 41 concert at Fiesta Mall. Daisy told me she was there but she wasn't there in time enough to see them. O well... I have had a hell a lot of swim practice this summer and on Monday and Friday I have it at 5:00 in the mornin. What a drag.I'm outtie.
